Name: Survive 4 Pleasure

Strip Club Select your sexuality (pan, gay, lesbian, straight) 3D discover the model and use different dances and emotes. Undress the model after reaching certain levels. Photo Mode (better rotate, zoom in, change colors, add stickers) unlick the pleasure room after reaching level 15 Unlock the second model after clearing all the zombies' waves. Survival mode Protect the gates and the scientist. Clear all zombies' waves Buy weapons. Use abilities and skills. Features -Challenging difficulty levels. -Different types of zombies to fight. -Exciting rewarding moments with the sexy girls. More waves are planned (Dragons, Vampires etc) More sexy models to be added in the next updates
